108 static int32_t HWAutil_configHWA_extendedVelocityScheme
109 (
110  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
111  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,

143 static void AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(cmplx16ImRe_t *rxChComp,
144  uint32_t numObj,
145  uint32_t numAnt,
146  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsIn,
147  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsOut)
148 {
149  int32_t Re, Im;
150  uint32_t i, j;
151  uint32_t antIndx;
152  uint32_t objIdx;
153 
154  for (objIdx = 0; objIdx < numObj; objIdx++)
155  {
156  j = 0;
157  /* Compensation of azimuth antennas */
158  for (antIndx = 0; antIndx < numAnt; antIndx++)
159  {
160  i = objIdx*numAnt + antIndx;
161  Re = (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real -
162  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag;
163 
164  Im = (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag +
165  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real;
166  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Re);
167  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Im);
168 
169  symbolsOut[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
170  symbolsOut[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
171  j++;
172  }
173  }
174 }

230 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_EDMA
231 (
232  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
233  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
234  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
235  uint32_t srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
236  uint32_t *dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
237  uint32_t *srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
238  uint32_t *dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
239 
240  uint32_t *srcIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
241  uint32_t *dstIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
242  uint32_t *srcOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
243  uint32_t *dstOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
244  uint8_t extMaxVelEnabled
245 
246 )
247 {
248  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
249  uint16_t numBlocks;
250  uint32_t pingPongIdx;
251  uint16_t numIterations = 1; //EDMA will be reloaded per target
252  uint16_t numHypotheses;
253 
254  EDMA_channelConfig_t config;
255  EDMA_paramConfig_t paramCfg;
256  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
257  bool isEventTriggered;
258  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
259  EDMA_Handle handle = res->edmaHandle;
260 
261 
262  if(extMaxVelEnabled)
263  {
264  numHypotheses = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
265  }
266  else
267  {
268  numHypotheses = 1;
269  }
270 
271  /* Set common fields for Params configuration */
272  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
273  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
274  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.linkAddress = EDMA_NULL_LINK_ADDRESS;
275  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddressingMode = (uint8_t) EDMA3_ADDRESSING_MODE_LINEAR;
276  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddressingMode = (uint8_t) EDMA3_ADDRESSING_MODE_LINEAR;
277  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.fifoWidth = (uint8_t) EDMA3_FIFO_WIDTH_8BIT;
278  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isStaticSet = false;
279  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isEarlyCompletion = false;
280  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
281  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
282 
283  /* Set a common configuration for physical input/output channels - initially set to dummy channel */
284  config.channelType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA;
285  config.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
286  config.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
287  memset(&config.paramSetConfig, 0, sizeof(EDMA_paramSetConfig_t));
288  config.paramSetConfig.aCount = 1;
289  config.paramSetConfig.bCount = 0;
290  config.paramSetConfig.cCount = 0;
291 
292 
293  numBlocks = (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
294  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
295  {
296 
297 
298  /************************************************************/
299  /* Physical Input channel is initially set to dummy channel */
300  /************************************************************/
301  config.channelId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
302  config.paramId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
303  config.eventQueueId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].eventQueue;
304  isEventTriggered = false;
305  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configChannel(handle, &config, isEventTriggered)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
306  {
307  goto exit;
308  }
309 
310  /************************************************************/
311  /* Physical Output channel is initially set to dummy channel */
312  /************************************************************/
313  config.channelId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
314  config.paramId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
315  config.eventQueueId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].eventQueue;
316  isEventTriggered = true;
317  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configChannel(handle, &config, isEventTriggered)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
318  {
319  goto exit;
320  }
321 
322  /* Set EDMA Transfer type to AB type */
323  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_SYNC_AB;
324  /************************/
325  /* Param set: 2D-FFT In */
326  /************************/
327  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
328  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
329  NULL);
330  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
331  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
332  NULL);
333  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
334  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = numBlocks;
335  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = numIterations;
336  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
337 
338  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = DPParams->numRangeBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
339  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
340 
341  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
342  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
343 
344  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
345  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
346  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
347  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
348  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
349 
350  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
351  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
352  {
353  goto exit;
354  }
355  /* Set EDMA Transfer type to A type */
356  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_SYNC_A;
357 
358  /**********************************/
359  /* Param set: 2D-FFT Signature In */
360  /**********************************/
361  HWA_getDMAconfig(hwaHandle,
362  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + (pingPongIdx * DPParams->numTxAntennas),
363  &dmaConfig);
364 
365  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,
366  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
367  NULL);
368  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,
369  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
370  NULL);
371  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = dmaConfig.aCnt;
372  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = dmaConfig.bCnt;
373  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = dmaConfig.cCnt;
374  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = dmaConfig.bCnt;
375 
376  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
377  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
378 
379  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
380  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
381 
382  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
383  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
384 
385  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = 0;
386  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
387  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
388 
389  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
390  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
391  {
392  goto exit;
393  }
394 
395  /************************/
396  /* Param set: 3D-FFT In */
397  /************************/
398  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
399  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
400  NULL);
401 
402  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
403  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
404  NULL);
405 
406  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = numHypotheses * (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
407  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
408  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
409  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
410 
411  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
412  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
413 
414  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
415  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
416 
417  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
418  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
419 
420  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
421  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
422  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
423 
424  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
425  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
426  {
427  goto exit;
428  }
429 
430  /**********************************/
431  /* Param set: 3D-FFT Signature In */
432  /**********************************/
433  uint32_t num3DFFTParamSets = ((DPParams->numVirtualAntElev>0)*1 + 2);
434  HWA_getDMAconfig(hwaHandle,
435  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + 2 * DPParams->numTxAntennas + (pingPongIdx * num3DFFTParamSets),
436  &dmaConfig);
437 
438 
439  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,
440  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
441  NULL);
442  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,
443  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
444  NULL);
445  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = dmaConfig.aCnt;
446  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = dmaConfig.bCnt;
447  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = dmaConfig.cCnt;
448  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = dmaConfig.bCnt;
449 
450  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
451  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
452 
453  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
454  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
455 
456  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
457  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
458 
459  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = 0;
460  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
461  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
462 
463  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle,
464  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
465  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
466  {
467  goto exit;
468  }
469 
470  /**********************************************/
471  /* Link Input physical channel and param sets */
472  /**********************************************/
473  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
474  (uint16_t) res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel,
475  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
476  {
477  goto exit;
478  }
479  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
480  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
481  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
482  {
483  goto exit;
484  }
485  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
486  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
487  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
488  {
489  goto exit;
490  }
491  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
492  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
493  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
494  {
495  goto exit;
496  }
497  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
498  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
499  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
500  {
501  goto exit;
502  }
503 
504  /********************************/
505  /* Bring in the first param set */
506  /********************************/
507  errorCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(handle,
508  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
509  if (errorCode != 0)
510  {
511  goto exit;
512  }
513 
514  /*********************/
515  /* 2D-FFT EDMA Out: */
516  /*********************/
517  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
518  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
519  NULL);
520  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
521  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
522  NULL);
523  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
524  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
525  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
526  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
527 
528  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
529  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
530 
531  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
532  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
533 
534  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
535  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
536  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
537  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
538  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
539 
540  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
541  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
542  {
543  goto exit;
544  }
545 
546  /*********************/
547  /* 3D-FFT EDMA Out: */
548  /*********************/
549  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
550  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
551  NULL);
552  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
553  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
554  NULL);
555  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = numHypotheses * DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS * sizeof(uint16_t);
556  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
557  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
558  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
559 
560  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
561  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
562 
563  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
564  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
565 
566  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
567  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
568  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
569  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
570  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
571 
572  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
573  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
574  {
575  goto exit;
576  }
577 
578  /***********************************************/
579  /* Link Output physical channel and param sets */
580  /***********************************************/
581  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
582  (uint16_t) res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel,
583  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
584  {
585  goto exit;
586  }
587  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
588  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
589  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
590  {
591  goto exit;
592  }
593  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
594  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
595  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
596  {
597  goto exit;
598  }
599 
600  /********************************/
601  /* Bring in the first param set */
602  /********************************/
603  errorCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(handle,
604  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
605  if (errorCode != 0)
606  {
607  goto exit;
608  }
609  }
610 
611 exit:
612  return(errorCode);
613 }

653 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_EDMA
654 (
655  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
656  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
657  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
658  uint32_t srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
659  uint32_t *dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
660  uint32_t *srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
661  uint32_t dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
662  uint8_t numTxAnt
663 )
664 {
665  int32_t retVal = 0;
666  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
667  uint16_t numBlocks;
668  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
669  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
670  uint32_t pingPongIdx;
671  uint16_t numIterations = DPParams->numRangeBins/AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
672  bool isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled = false;
673  bool isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled = true;
674 
675  numBlocks = (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim) * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
676  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF; pingPongIdx++)
677  {
678  /************************************************************/
679  /* EDMA In: load to HWA all antennas, azimuth and elevation */
680  /************************************************************/
681 
682  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
683  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].inSignature.channel;
684  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
685  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
686 
687  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr + pingPongIdx * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
688  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx];
689  syncABCfg.aCount = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
690  syncABCfg.bCount = numBlocks;
691  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
692  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = DPParams->numRangeBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
693  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
694  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
695  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = 0;
696 
697  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
698  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in,
699  &chainingCfg,
700  &syncABCfg,
701  false,//isEventTriggered
702  false, //isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled
703  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
704  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
705  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
706  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
707  {
708  goto exit;
709  }
710 
711  /* Copy one hot signature to trigger HWA 2D FFT */
712  retVal = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(res->edmaHandle,
713  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].inSignature,
714  hwaHandle,
715  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + (pingPongIdx * numTxAnt),
716  false);
717  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
718  {
719  goto exit;
720  }
721 
722  /**************/
723  /* EDMA Out: */
724  /**************/
725 
726  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
727  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel;
728  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
729  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
730 
731  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx];
732  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr + pingPongIdx * DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ;
733  syncABCfg.aCount = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
734  syncABCfg.bCount = 1;
735  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
736  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = 0;
737  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = 0;
738  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = 0;
739  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
740 
741  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
742  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].out,
743  &chainingCfg,
744  &syncABCfg,
745  true,//isEventTriggered
746  isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled,
747  isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled,
748  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
749  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
750 
751  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
752  {
753  goto exit;
754  }
755  }
756 
757 exit:
758  return(retVal);
759 }
760 
761 
762 
779 int32_t AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
780  uint32_t detObjIdx,
781  uint8_t pingPongIdx)
782 {
783  int32_t retVal;
784  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
785  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
786  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
787  uint32_t dopplerBinSize = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev);
788  uint32_t srcBuffAddr;
789 
790  /* EDMA In Source address in radar cube */
791  srcBuffAddr = (uint32_t) (&radarCubeBase[res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdx].rangeIdx]);
792  retVal = EDMA_setSourceAddress(res->edmaHandle,
793  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel,
794  SOC_translateAddress(srcBuffAddr, SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA, NULL));
795  if (retVal != 0)
796  {
797  goto exit;
798  }
799 
800  /* EDMA Out Source address in M2 or M3 */
801  srcBuffAddr = aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx] +
802  res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdx].dopplerIdx * dopplerBinSize;
803  retVal = EDMA_setSourceAddress(res->edmaHandle,
804  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel,
805  SOC_translateAddress(srcBuffAddr, SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA, NULL));
806  if (retVal != 0)
807  {
808  goto exit;
809  }
810 
811  /* Trigger single bin 2D FFT */
812  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
813  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
814  if (retVal != 0)
815  {
816  goto exit;
817  }
818 exit:
819  return retVal;
820 }
821 
835 int32_t AoAProcHWA_trigger_EDMA_3DFFT(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
836  uint8_t pingPongIdx)
837 {
838  int32_t retVal;
839  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
840 
841  /* Trigger 3D-FFT */
842  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
843  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
844 
845  return retVal;
846 }
847 
884 static int32_t HWAutil_configHWA_extendedVelocityScheme
885 (
886  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
887  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
888  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
889  uint32_t *hwaMemBankAddr,
890  uint8_t extMaxVelEnabled,
891  uint32_t numAzimuthBins
892 )
893 {
894  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
895  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
896  int32_t retVal = 0;
897  int32_t i;
898  uint32_t pingPongidx;
899  int32_t paramSetCurrentIdx;
900  uint8_t dmaTriggerDest;
901  uint8_t numHypotheses;
902 
903  if(extMaxVelEnabled)
904  {
905  numHypotheses = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
906  }
907  else
908  {
909  numHypotheses = 1;
910  }
911 
912  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
913  uint32_t windowOffset = res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset;
914  uint8_t winSym = res->hwaCfg.winSym;
915  uint32_t numDopplerChirps = DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
916  uint32_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
917  uint8_t numRxAnt = DPParams->numRxAntennas;
918  uint8_t numTxAnt = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
919  uint8_t numVirtualAntAzim = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim;
920  uint8_t numVirtualAntElev = DPParams->numVirtualAntElev;
921 
922  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource[2];
923  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest[2];
924 
925 
926  hwaMemAzimSource[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
927  hwaMemAzimSource[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[1]);
928  hwaMemAzimDest[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[2]);
929  hwaMemAzimDest[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[3]);
930 
931 
932 
933  /* Disable the HWA */
934  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
935  if (retVal != 0)
936  {
937  goto exit;
938  }
939 
940  /**********************************************************/
941  /******************* Configure 2D-FFT *********************/
942  /**********************************************************/
943  paramSetCurrentIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
944  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
945  {
946  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
947 
948 
949  /* Program 2D FFT */
950  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
951  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
952 
953  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
954 
955  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //
956  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt - 1;
957  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //should be dont care
958  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
959  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
960  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
961  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
962  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
963  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
964  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
965  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
966  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
967 
968  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numDopplerBins -1;
969  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
970  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ; //should be dont care
971  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
972  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
973  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
974  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
975  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
976  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
977 
978  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
979  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins);
980  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant
981  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
982  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
983  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffset; //start of window RAM
984  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = winSym;
985  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
986  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
987  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
988 
989  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
990 
991  for (i = 0; i < numTxAnt; i++)
992  {
993  if (i == 0)
994  {
995  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
996  }
997  else
998  {
999  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1000  }
1001  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] + i * numDopplerChirps * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1002  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx] + i * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1003  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1004  if (retVal != 0)
1005  {
1006  goto exit;
1007  }
1008 
1009  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
1010  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1011  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1012  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1013  if (retVal != 0)
1014  {
1015  goto exit;
1016  }
1017  /* Output interrupt to DMA only by last param set */
1018  if (i == (numTxAnt-1))
1019  {
1020  /* Last param set: enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
1021  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1022  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongidx].chOut.channel,
1023  &dmaTriggerDest);
1024  if (retVal != 0)
1025  {
1026  goto exit;
1027  }
1028  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1029  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1030  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1031  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1032  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1033  &paramISRConfig);
1034  if (retVal != 0)
1035  {
1036  goto exit;
1037  }
1038  }
1039  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1040  }
1041  }
1042 
1043  /**********************************************************/
1044  /******************* Configure 3D-FFT *********************/
1045  /**********************************************************/
1046  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
1047  {
1048  /************** Param set computes the complex values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
1049  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1050  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1051  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1052 
1053  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx];
1054  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntAzim-1;
1055  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1056  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1057  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numHypotheses-1;
1058  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1059  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
1060 
1061  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1062  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1063  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numAzimuthBins);//assumes power of 2;
1064  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1065  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
1066 
1067  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1068  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numAzimuthBins-1;
1069  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1070  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1071  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1072  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
1073 
1074  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1075  if (retVal != 0)
1076  {
1077  goto exit;
1078  }
1079  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1080  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1081  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1082  if (retVal != 0)
1083  {
1084  goto exit;
1085  }
1086 
1087  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1088 
1089  if (numVirtualAntElev > 0)
1090  {
1091  /************** Param set computes the complex values of the elevation-FFT **********/
1092  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1093  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1094 
1095  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) (hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] +
1096  (numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)));
1097  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntElev-1;
1098  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1099  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1100  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numHypotheses-1;
1101  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1102  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
1103 
1104 
1105  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1106  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1107  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numAzimuthBins);//assumes power of 2;
1108  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1109  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
1110 
1111  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) (hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx] +
1112  (numHypotheses * numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)));
1113  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numAzimuthBins-1;
1114  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1115  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1116  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1117  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
1118 
1119  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1120  if (retVal != 0)
1121  {
1122  goto exit;
1123  }
1124  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1125  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1126  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1127  if (retVal != 0)
1128  {
1129  goto exit;
1130  }
1131 
1132  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1133  }
1134 
1135  //This calculates magnitude
1136  /************** Param set computes magnitude of input complex values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
1137  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1138  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1139 
1140  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1141  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numAzimuthBins - 1;
1142  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1143  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1144  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numHypotheses-1;
1145  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1146  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
1147 
1148  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1149  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 0;
1150  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numAzimuthBins);//Ignored
1151  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1152  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
1153  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
1154 
1155  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] + DPU_AOAPROCHWA_3DFFT_MAG_SQUARE_ADDRSS_OFFSET;
1156  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numAzimuthBins-1;
1157  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
1158  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(uint16_t);
1159  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
1160  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 0;
1161  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
1162 
1163  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1164  if (retVal != 0)
1165  {
1166  goto exit;
1167  }
1168 
1169  /* Enable the DMA hookup to EDMA */
1170  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1171  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongidx].chOut.channel,
1172  &dmaTriggerDest);
1173  if (retVal != 0)
1174  {
1175  goto exit;
1176  }
1177  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1178  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1179  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1180  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1181  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1182  &paramISRConfig);
1183  if (retVal != 0)
1184  {
1185  goto exit;
1186  }
1187 
1188  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1189 
1190  }
1191 exit:
1192  return (retVal);
1193 }
1194 
1219 static int32_t HWAutil_configHWA_azimuthHeatMap
1220 (
1221  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1222  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
1223  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
1224  uint32_t *hwaMemBankAddr,
1225  uint8_t numAzimTxAnt
1226 )
1227 {
1228  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
1229  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
1230  int32_t retVal = 0;
1231  int32_t i;
1232  uint32_t pingPongidx;
1233  int32_t paramSetCurrentIdx;
1234  uint8_t dmaTriggerDest;
1235 
1236  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
1237  uint32_t windowOffset = res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset;
1238  uint8_t winSym = res->hwaCfg.winSym;
1239  uint32_t numDopplerChirps = DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
1240  uint32_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
1241  uint8_t numRxAnt = DPParams->numRxAntennas;
1242  uint8_t numVirtualAntAzim = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim;
1243 
1244  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource[2];
1245  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest[2];
1246 
1247 
1248  hwaMemAzimSource[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
1249  hwaMemAzimSource[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[1]);
1250  hwaMemAzimDest[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[2]);
1251  hwaMemAzimDest[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[3]);
1252 
1253  uint32_t numOutSamplesPerFft = 1;
1254 
1255 
1256 
1257  /* Disable the HWA */
1258  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1259  if (retVal != 0)
1260  {
1261  goto exit;
1262  }
1263 
1264  /**********************************************************/
1265  /******************* Configure 2D-FFT *********************/
1266  /**********************************************************/
1267  paramSetCurrentIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
1268  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
1269  {
1270  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
1271 
1272 
1273  /* Program 2D FFT */
1274  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1275  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
1276 
1277  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
1278 
1279  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //
1280  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt - 1;
1281  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //should be dont care
1282  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
1283  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
1284  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
1285  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
1286  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
1287  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1288  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1289  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
1290  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
1291 
1292  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numOutSamplesPerFft -1;
1293  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1294  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ; //should be dont care
1295  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
1296  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
1297  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
1298  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1299  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
1300  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
1301 
1302  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1303  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins);
1304  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant
1305  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
1306  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
1307  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffset; //start of window RAM
1308  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = winSym;
1309  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
1310  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
1311  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
1312 
1313  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1314 
1315  for (i = 0; i < numAzimTxAnt; i++)
1316  {
1317  if (i == 0)
1318  {
1319  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1320  }
1321  else
1322  {
1323  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1324  }
1325 
1326  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] + i * numDopplerChirps * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1327  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx] + i * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1328  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1329  if (retVal != 0)
1330  {
1331  goto exit;
1332  }
1333 
1334  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
1335  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1336  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1337  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1338  if (retVal != 0)
1339  {
1340  goto exit;
1341  }
1342  /* Output interrupt to DMA only by last param set */
1343  if (i == (numAzimTxAnt-1))
1344  {
1345  /* Last param set: enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
1346  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1347  res->edmaHwa[pingPongidx].out.channel,
1348  &dmaTriggerDest);
1349  if (retVal != 0)
1350  {
1351  goto exit;
1352  }
1353  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1354  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1355  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1356  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1357  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1358  &paramISRConfig);
1359  if (retVal != 0)
1360  {
1361  goto exit;
1362  }
1363  }
1364  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1365  }
1366  }
1367 
1368 exit:
1369  return (retVal);
1370 }
1371 
1372 
1373 
1393 static int32_t AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1394  uint16_t numLoops,
1395  uint16_t paramStartIdx,
1396  uint16_t numParams)
1397 {
1398  int32_t errCode = 0;
1399  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
1400 
1401  /* Disable the HWA */
1402  errCode = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1403  if (errCode != 0)
1404  {
1405  goto exit;
1406  }
1407 
1408  /***********************/
1409  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
1410  /***********************/
1411  /* Config Common Registers */
1412  hwaCommonConfig.configMask =
1413  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
1414  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
1415  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
1416  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
1417  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
1418 
1419  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = numLoops;
1420  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = paramStartIdx;
1421  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = paramStartIdx + (numParams-1);
1422 
1423  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
1424  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
1425 
1426  errCode = HWA_configCommon(hwaHandle, &hwaCommonConfig);
1427 exit:
1428  return (errCode);
1429 }
1430 
1447 int32_t AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(SemaphoreP_Handle semaHandle)
1448 {
1449  return((int32_t) SemaphoreP_pend(semaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER));
1450 }
1451 
1482 uint32_t AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation
1483 (
1484  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1485  uint32_t pingPongIdx,
1486  uint32_t objInIdx,
1487  uint32_t objOutIdx,
1488  uint32_t maxIdx,
1489  int32_t dopplerIdx,
1490  uint32_t hypothesisIdx
1491 )
1492 {
1493  int32_t sMaxIdx;
1494  float temp;
1495  float Wx, Wz;
1496  float range;
1497  float limitScale;
1498  float x, y, z;
1499  float peakAzimRe, peakAzimIm, peakElevRe, peakElevIm;
1500  uint32_t numAngleBins = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1501  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1502  DPIF_CFARDetList *objIn = res->cfarRngDopSnrList;
1503  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *objOut = res->detObjOut;
1504  DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo *objOutSideInfo = res->detObjOutSideInfo;
1505 
1506  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *params = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1507  //uint16_t numDopplerBins = params->numDopplerBins;
1508 
1509  cmplx16ImRe_t *azimFFTPtr = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) (aoaHwaObj->hwaAzimuthFftCmplxOutBuffAddr[pingPongIdx] + (hypothesisIdx*numAngleBins)*sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t));
1510 
1511  uint32_t numHypotheses;
1512 
1513  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg.enabled)
1514  {
1515  numHypotheses = aoaHwaObj->params.numTxAntennas;
1516  }
1517  else
1518  {
1519  numHypotheses = 1;
1520  }
1521 
1522 
1523 
1524 
1525  range = objIn[objInIdx].rangeIdx * params->rangeStep;
1526 
1527  /* Compensate for range bias */
1528  range -= aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rangeBias;
1529  if (range < 0)
1530  {
1531  range = 0;
1532  }
1533 
1534  if(maxIdx > (numAngleBins/2 -1))
1535  {
1536  sMaxIdx = maxIdx - numAngleBins;
1537  }
1538  else
1539  {
1540  sMaxIdx = maxIdx;
1541  }
1542 
1543  Wx = 2 * (float) sMaxIdx / numAngleBins;
1544  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
1545 
1546  x = range * Wx;
1547 
1548  if (params->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
1549  {
1550  peakAzimIm = (float) azimFFTPtr[maxIdx].imag;
1551  peakAzimRe = (float) azimFFTPtr[maxIdx].real;
1552  peakElevIm = (float) azimFFTPtr[maxIdx + numHypotheses*numAngleBins].imag;
1553  peakElevRe = (float) azimFFTPtr[maxIdx + numHypotheses*numAngleBins].real;
1554 
1555  Wz = atan2(peakAzimIm * peakElevRe - peakAzimRe * peakElevIm,
1556  peakAzimRe * peakElevRe + peakAzimIm * peakElevIm)/PI_ + (2 * Wx);
1557 
1558  if (Wz > 1)
1559  {
1560  Wz = Wz - 2;
1561  }
1562  else if (Wz < -1)
1563  {
1564  Wz = Wz + 2;
1565  }
1566  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
1567  if((Wz < aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal) || (Wz > aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal))
1568  {
1569  goto exit;
1570  }
1571 
1572  z = range * Wz;
1573  /*record wz for debugging/testing*/
1574  res->detObjElevationAngle[objOutIdx] = Wz;
1575  limitScale = sqrt(1 - Wz*Wz);
1576  }
1577  else
1578  {
1579  z = 0;
1580  limitScale = 1;
1581  }
1582 
1583  if((Wx < (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal)) ||
1584  (Wx > (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal)))
1585  {
1586  goto exit;
1587  }
1588 
1589  temp = range*range -x*x -z*z;
1590  if (temp > 0)
1591  {
1592  y = sqrt(temp);
1593  }
1594  else
1595  {
1596  goto exit;
1597  }
1598 
1599  objOut[objOutIdx].x = x;
1600  objOut[objOutIdx].y = y;
1601  objOut[objOutIdx].z = z;
1602 
1603  objOut[objOutIdx].velocity = params->dopplerStep * dopplerIdx;
1604  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].noise = objIn[objInIdx].noise;
1605  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].snr = objIn[objInIdx].snr;
1606  res->detObj2dAzimIdx[objOutIdx] = maxIdx;
1607 
1608  objOutIdx++;
1609 
1610 exit:
1611  return (objOutIdx);
1612 }
1613 
1632 static void aoaHwa_dopplerComp
1633 (
1634  cmplx16ImRe_t *in,
1635  cmplx16ImRe_t *out,
1636  float Cos,
1637  float Sin
1638 )
1639 {
1640  float yRe, yIm;
1641 
1642  /* Rotate symbol (correct the phase) */
1643  yRe = in->real * Cos + in->imag * Sin;
1644  yIm = in->imag * Cos - in->real * Sin;
1645 
1646  out->real = (int16_t) yRe;
1647  out->imag = (int16_t) yIm;
1648 }
1649 
1678 static void aoaHwa_dopplerCompensation
1679 (
1680  uint32_t *srcPtr,
1681  DPIF_CFARDetList *cfarOutList,
1682  uint32_t *dstPtr,
1683  uint32_t numTxAnt,
1684  uint32_t numRxAnt,
1685  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
1686  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
1687  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
1688  uint32_t extendedMaxVelEnabled
1689 )
1690 {
1691  uint32_t index;
1692  uint32_t j;
1693  uint32_t virtAntIdx;
1694  uint32_t txAntIdx;
1695  uint16_t dopplerIdx;
1696  int32_t dopplerSignIdx;
1697  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
1698  int32_t wrapInd;
1699  uint32_t numHypotheses;
1700  float Cos,Sin,temp;
1701  uint32_t numVirtualAnt;
1702 
1703  dopplerIdx = cfarOutList->dopplerIdx;
1704  dopplerSignIdx = (int32_t) dopplerIdx;
1705  if(dopplerIdx >= (numDopplerBins/2))
1706  {
1707  dopplerSignIdx = dopplerSignIdx - (int32_t) numDopplerBins;
1708  }
1709 
1710  if(extendedMaxVelEnabled)
1711  {
1712  numHypotheses = numTxAnt;
1713  wrapInd = - ((int32_t) (numHypotheses >> 1));
1714  if (!(numTxAnt & 0x1) && (dopplerSignIdx < 0))
1715  {
1716  wrapInd++;
1717  }
1718  }
1719  else
1720  {
1721  numHypotheses = 1;
1722  wrapInd = 0;
1723  }
1724 
1725  numVirtualAnt = numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev;
1726 
1727  for(index = 0; index < numHypotheses; index++)
1728  {
1729  virtAntIdx = 0;
1730  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
1731  for(j = 0; j < numRxAnt; j++)
1732  {
1733  dstPtr[virtAntIdx + index*numVirtualAnt] = srcPtr[virtAntIdx];
1734  virtAntIdx++;
1735  }
1736 
1737  if(numTxAnt > 1)
1738  {
1739  dopplerCompensationIdx = (dopplerSignIdx + (wrapInd * (int32_t)numDopplerBins)) / (float)numTxAnt;
1740  Cos = cos(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
1741  Sin = sin(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
1742 
1743  for(txAntIdx=1; txAntIdx < numTxAnt; txAntIdx++)
1744  {
1745  for(j = 0; j < numRxAnt; j++)
1746  {
1747  aoaHwa_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)&srcPtr[virtAntIdx],
1748  (cmplx16ImRe_t *)&dstPtr[virtAntIdx + index*numVirtualAnt],
1749  Cos,
1750  Sin);
1751  virtAntIdx++;
1752  }
1753 
1754  if (txAntIdx < (numTxAnt-1))
1755  {
1756  /* Increment Doppler phase shift */
1757  temp = Cos * Cos - Sin * Sin;
1758  Sin = 2 * Cos * Sin;
1759  Cos = temp;
1760  }
1761 
1762  }
1763  }
1764  wrapInd++;
1765  }
1766 }
1767 
1768 
1787 static uint32_t AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev
1788 (
1789  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1790  uint32_t objInIdx,
1791  uint32_t pingPongIdx,
1792  uint32_t objOutIdx
1793 )
1794 {
1795  uint32_t j, maxVal = 0,maxIdx = 0, tempVal;
1796  //uint32_t objInHwaIdx;
1797  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1798  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1799  DPIF_CFARDetList *objIn = res->cfarRngDopSnrList;
1800 
1801 
1802  uint32_t numAngleBins = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1803  uint16_t maxNumObj = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
1804  uint32_t numHypotheses;
1805  int32_t hypothesisMaxIdx;
1806  uint16_t *azimFFTAbsPtr = (uint16_t *)aoaHwaObj->azimuthFftOutMagBuf[pingPongIdx];
1807  int16_t dopplerSignIdx;
1808  int32_t wrapStartInd;
1809  uint8_t numTxAnt = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
1810  uint16_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
1811 
1812  if (objOutIdx >= maxNumObj)
1813  {
1814  return objOutIdx;
1815  }
1816 
1817  dopplerSignIdx = AOA_DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(objIn[objInIdx].dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins);
1818 
1819  if(aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg.enabled)
1820  {
1821  numHypotheses = aoaHwaObj->params.numTxAntennas;
1822  wrapStartInd = - ((int32_t) (numHypotheses >> 1));
1823  if (!(numTxAnt & 0x1) && (dopplerSignIdx < 0))
1824  {
1825  wrapStartInd++;
1826  }
1827  }
1828  else
1829  {
1830  numHypotheses = 1;
1831  wrapStartInd = 0;
1832  }
1833 
1834 
1835 
1836  maxVal = 0;
1837  for(j=0; j < numHypotheses * numAngleBins; j++)
1838  {
1839  tempVal = azimFFTAbsPtr[j];
1840  if(tempVal > maxVal)
1841  {
1842  maxVal = tempVal;
1843  maxIdx = j;
1844  }
1845  }
1846 
1847  hypothesisMaxIdx = maxIdx >> DPU_AOAPROCHWA_LOG2_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1848  maxIdx = maxIdx & (numAngleBins - 1);
1849 
1850  dopplerSignIdx += (wrapStartInd + hypothesisMaxIdx) * (int16_t) numDopplerBins;
1851 
1852  /* Estimate x,y,z */
1853  objOutIdx = AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation(aoaHwaObj,
1854  pingPongIdx,
1855  objInIdx,
1856  objOutIdx,
1857  maxIdx,
1858  dopplerSignIdx,
1859  hypothesisMaxIdx);
1860 
1861  if (objOutIdx >= maxNumObj)
1862  {
1863  return objOutIdx;
1864  }
1865 
1866  /* Multi peak azimuzth search?*/
1867  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
1868  {
1869  uint32_t leftSearchIdx;
1870  uint32_t rightSearchIdx;
1871  uint32_t secondSearchLen;
1872  uint32_t iModAzimLen;
1873  uint32_t maxVal2;
1874  int32_t k;
1875  uint32_t t;
1876  uint16_t azimIdx = maxIdx;
1877  uint16_t* azimuthMag = &azimFFTAbsPtr[hypothesisMaxIdx * numAngleBins];
1878 
1879  /* Find right edge of the first peak */
1880  t = azimIdx;
1881  leftSearchIdx = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1882  k = numAngleBins;
1883  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
1884  {
1885  t = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1886  leftSearchIdx = (leftSearchIdx + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1887  k--;
1888  }
1889 
1890  /* Find left edge of the first peak */
1891  t = azimIdx;
1892  rightSearchIdx = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1893  k = numAngleBins;
1894  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[rightSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
1895  {
1896  t = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1897  rightSearchIdx = (rightSearchIdx - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1898  k--;
1899  }
1900 
1901  secondSearchLen = ((rightSearchIdx - leftSearchIdx) & (numAngleBins-1)) + 1;
1902  /* Find second peak */
1903  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx];
1904  azimIdx = leftSearchIdx;
1905  for (t = leftSearchIdx; t < (leftSearchIdx + secondSearchLen); t++)
1906  {
1907  iModAzimLen = t & (numAngleBins-1);
1908  if (azimuthMag[iModAzimLen] > maxVal2)
1909  {
1910  azimIdx = iModAzimLen;
1911  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[iModAzimLen];
1912  }
1913  }
1914  /* Is second peak greater than threshold? */
1915  if ( (maxVal2 >( ((uint32_t)(maxVal * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.multiPeakThrsScal)))) && (objOutIdx < maxNumObj) )
1916  {
1917 
1918  /* Estimate x,y,z for second peak */
1919  objOutIdx = AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation(aoaHwaObj,
1920  pingPongIdx,
1921  objInIdx,
1922  objOutIdx,
1923  azimIdx,
1924  dopplerSignIdx,
1925  hypothesisMaxIdx);
1926  }
1927  }
1928  return(objOutIdx);
1929 }
1930 
1947 int32_t AOAHWA_waitEdma(AOAHwaObj * aoaHwaObj,
1948  uint8_t channel)
1949 {
1950  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1951  int32_t errCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
1952 
1953  /* wait until transfer done */
1954  volatile bool isTransferDone;
1955  do {
1956  if ((errCode = EDMA_isTransferComplete(res->edmaHandle,
1957  channel,
1958  (bool *)&isTransferDone)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1959  {
1960  break;
1961  }
1962  } while (isTransferDone == false);
1963 
1964  return errCode;
1965 }
1966 
1967 
1986 int32_t AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1987  volatile uint32_t *waitTimeLocal)
1988 {
1989  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
1990  int32_t retVal = 0;
1991  uint16_t numParams;
1992  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
1993  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase;
1994  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
1995  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
1996  uint8_t numTxAzimAnt;
1997  uint8_t pingPongIdx;
1998 
1999  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2000  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
2001  radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
2002  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
2003 
2004  numTxAzimAnt = (uint8_t) (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim / DPParams->numRxAntennas);
2005 
2006  retVal = HWAutil_configHWA_azimuthHeatMap(hwaHandle,
2007  res,
2008  DPParams,
2009  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr,
2010  numTxAzimAnt);
2011  if (retVal != 0)
2012  {
2013  goto exit;
2014  }
2015 
2016  numParams = numTxAzimAnt * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
2017  retVal = AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (hwaHandle,
2018  DPParams->numRangeBins / AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF, //numLoops,
2019  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
2020  numParams);
2021  if (retVal != 0)
2022  {
2023  goto exit;
2024  }
2025 
2026  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_EDMA(hwaHandle,
2027  res,
2028  DPParams,
2029  (uint32_t) radarCubeBase,
2030  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
2031  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
2032  (uint32_t) res->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2033  numTxAzimAnt);
2034  if (retVal != 0)
2035  {
2036  goto exit;
2037  }
2038 
2039  /* Enable the HWA */
2040  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
2041  if (retVal != 0)
2042  {
2043  goto exit;
2044  }
2045 
2046  /* Trigger first two range bins 2D FFT */
2047  pingPongIdx = 0;
2048  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
2049  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2050  pingPongIdx = 1;
2051  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
2052  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2053 
2054  if (retVal != 0)
2055  {
2056  goto exit;
2057  }
2058 
2059  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT */
2060  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2061  AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2062  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2063 
2064  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
2065  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2066  pingPongIdx = 0;
2067  retVal = AOAHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj,
2068  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2069  pingPongIdx = 1;
2070  retVal = AOAHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj,
2071  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2072  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2073  if (retVal != 0)
2074  {
2075  goto exit;
2076  }
2077 
2078  /* Disable the HWA */
2079  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
2080  if (retVal != 0)
2081  {
2082  goto exit;
2083  }
2084 
2085  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2086  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
2087  DPParams->numRangeBins,
2088  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim,
2089  res->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2090  res->azimuthStaticHeatMap);
2091 exit:
2092  return retVal;
2093 }
2094 
2110 void AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2111  DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *fovAoaCfg)
2112 {
2113  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
2114  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
2115  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
2116  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
2117 }
2118 
2133 uint16_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_getNumHwaParamSets
2134 (
2135  uint16_t numTxAnt,
2136  uint16_t numRxVirtAntElevation
2137 )
2138 {
2139  return (2 * ((numTxAnt) + 2 + (1 & ((numRxVirtAntElevation) > 0))));
2140 }
2141 
2142 DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle DPU_AoAProcHWA_init
2143 (
2144  DPU_AoAProcHWA_InitParams *initParams,
2145  int32_t* errCode
2146 )
2147 {
2148  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = NULL;
2149  HWA_MemInfo hwaMemInfo;
2150  uint8_t index;
2151  SemaphoreP_Params semParams;
2152 
2153  if ((initParams == NULL) || (initParams->hwaHandle == NULL))
2154  {
2155  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2156  goto exit;
2157  }
2158 
2159  aoaHwaObj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(AOAHwaObj), 0);
2160  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2161  {
2162  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM;
2163  goto exit;
2164  }
2165 
2166  /* Save for debugging */
2167 #ifdef DBG_AOA_HWA_OBJ_DPU
2168  if (gAoaHwaObjInd < RL_MAX_SUBFRAMES)
2169  {
2170  gAoaHwaObj[gAoaHwaObjInd++] = aoaHwaObj;
2171  }
2172 #endif
2173 
2174  /* Set HWA bank memory address */
2175  *errCode = HWA_getHWAMemInfo(initParams->hwaHandle, &hwaMemInfo);
2176  if (*errCode < 0)
2177  {
2178  goto exit;
2179  }
2180 
2181  /* Initialize memory */
2182  memset((void *)aoaHwaObj, 0, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
2183 
2184  /* Save init config params */
2185  aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle = initParams->hwaHandle;
2186 
2187  for (index = 0; index < hwaMemInfo.numBanks; index++)
2188  {
2189  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[index] = hwaMemInfo.baseAddress + index * hwaMemInfo.bankSize;
2190  }
2191 
2192  /* Create semaphore for HWA done */
2193  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
2194  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
2195  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
2196  if(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle == NULL)
2197  {
2198  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ESEMA;
2199  goto exit;
2200  }
2201 
2202 
2203  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]; //HWA M0
2204  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[1]; //HWA M1
2205 
2206  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[2]; //HWA M2
2207  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[3]; //HWA M3
2208 
2209  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]; //HWA M0
2210  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[1]; //HWA M1
2211 
2212  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0] + DPU_AOAPROCHWA_3DFFT_MAG_SQUARE_ADDRSS_OFFSET; //HWA M0
2213  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[1] + DPU_AOAPROCHWA_3DFFT_MAG_SQUARE_ADDRSS_OFFSET; //HWA M1
2214 
2215  aoaHwaObj->hwaAzimuthFftCmplxOutBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[2]; //HWA M2
2216  aoaHwaObj->hwaAzimuthFftCmplxOutBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[3]; //HWA M3
2217 
2218 exit:
2219  return ((DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle)aoaHwaObj);
2220 }
2221 
2222 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_config
2223 (
2224  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
2225  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Config *aoaHwaCfg
2226 )
2227 {
2228  int32_t retVal = 0;
2229  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
2230  int32_t i;
2231 
2232  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2233  {
2234  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2235  goto exit;
2236  }
2237 
2238  /* Check if radar cube formats are supported. */
2239  if (!(aoaHwaCfg->res.radarCube.datafmt == DPIF_RADARCUBE_FORMAT_1))
2240  {
2241  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL__RADARCUBE_DATAFORMAT;
2242  goto exit;
2243  }
2244 
2245 
2246  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.cfarRngDopSnrList,
2247  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2248  {
2249  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_CFAR_DET_LIST;
2250  goto exit;
2251  }
2252 
2253  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOut,
2254  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2255  {
2256  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN;
2257  goto exit;
2258  }
2259 
2260  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOutSideInfo,
2261  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2262  {
2263  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO;
2264  goto exit;
2265  }
2266 
2267  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2268  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2269  {
2270  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2271  goto exit;
2272  }
2273 
2274  /* Check if radar cube range column fits into one HWA memory bank */
2275  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
2276  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
2277  {
2278  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
2279  goto exit;
2280  }
2281 
2282  /* Check if complex values of 2D FFT fit in one HWA memory bank (16B) */
2283  /* HWA is running in ping/pong manner, so only one bank is available */
2284  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
2285  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
2286  {
2287  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
2288  goto exit;
2289  }
2290 
2291  /* Check Heapmap configuration */
2292  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2293  {
2294  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
2295  (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntAzim))
2296  {
2297  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM__AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2298  goto exit;
2299  }
2300 
2301  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL)
2302  {
2303  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2304  goto exit;
2305  }
2306  }
2307 
2308  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjElevationAngle,
2309  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2310  {
2311  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE;
2312  goto exit;
2313  }
2314 
2315  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap && (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntAzim == 1))
2316  {
2317  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVALID_NUM_VIRT_ANT_AND_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2318  goto exit;
2319  }
2320 
2321  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOutMaxSize & 0x1)
2322  {
2323  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EDETECTED_OBJECT_LIST_SIZE_ODD_NUMBER;
2324  goto exit;
2325  }
2326 
2327  for(i = 0; i < DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFERS; i++)
2328  {
2329  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i],
2330  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2331  {
2332  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUF;
2333  goto exit;
2334  }
2335  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i] == NULL)
2336  {
2337  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2338  goto exit;
2339  }
2340  }
2341  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBufferSizeBytes !=
2342  (DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES(aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas)))
2343  {
2344  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUF;
2345  goto exit;
2346  }
2347 
2348  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.radarCube.data,
2349  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_RADAR_CUBE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2350  {
2351  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_RADAR_CUBE;
2352  goto exit;
2353  }
2354 
2355 
2356 #if DEBUG_CHECK_PARAMS
2357  /* Validate params */
2358  if(!aoaHwaCfg->edmaHandle ||
2359  !aoaHwaCfg->hwaHandle ||
2360  !aoaHwaCfg->params ||
2361  !aoaHwaCfg->radarCube ||
2362  !aoaHwaCfg->detObjOut ||
2363  (aoaHwaCfg->numParamSet != 1)
2364  )
2365  {
2366  retVal= DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2367  goto exit;
2368  }
2369 #endif
2370  aoaHwaObj->res = aoaHwaCfg->res;
2371  aoaHwaObj->params = aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg;
2372 
2373  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.compRxChanCfg;
2374  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg;
2375  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap = aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap;
2376  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.fovAoaCfg);
2377 
2378  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.extMaxVelCfg;
2379 
2380  /* Allocate buffers for ping and pong paths: */
2381  for (i = 0; i < DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFERS; i++)
2382  {
2383  uint32_t byteAlignment;
2384 
2385  aoaHwaObj->azimuthFftOutMagBuf[i] = (uint16_t *) aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i];
2386  aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[i] = (uint32_t *) aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i];
2387 
2388 #ifndef SOC_XWR68XX
2389  /* Speculative workaround for an issue where EDMA is not completing transfer. */
2390  if (((uint32_t)aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * (uint32_t)aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas *
2391  (uint32_t)aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) == 64U)
2392  {
2393  /* Note this will only happen when numTxAntennas = 2 and numRxAntennas = 4 */
2394  byteAlignment = 64U;
2395  }
2396  else
2397 #endif
2398  {
2399  byteAlignment = 1U;
2400  }
2401  aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalHypothesesBuf[i] =
2402  (uint32_t *) MEM_ALIGN((uint32_t)&aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[i][aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas *
2403  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas],
2404  byteAlignment);
2405  }
2406 
2407  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[0][0];
2408  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[1][0];
2409  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalHypothesesBuf[0][0];
2410  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalHypothesesBuf[1][0];
2411  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimuthFftOutMagBuf[0][0];
2412  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimuthFftOutMagBuf[1][0];
2413 
2414 
2415  /* Windowing configuraiton in HWA */
2416  retVal = HWA_configRam(aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle,
2417  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
2418  (uint8_t *)aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.window,
2419  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.windowSize, /* size in bytes */
2420  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.winRamOffset * sizeof(uint32_t));
2421  if (retVal != 0)
2422  {
2423  goto exit;
2424  }
2425 
2426 exit:
2427  return retVal;
2428 }
2429 
2430 
2431 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_process
2432 (
2433  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
2434  uint32_t numObjsIn,
2435  DPU_AoAProcHWA_OutParams *outParams
2436 )
2437 {
2438  volatile uint32_t startTime;
2439  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
2440  volatile uint32_t waitTimeLocal = 0;
2441  int32_t retVal = 0;
2442  uint16_t idx;
2443  uint16_t detObjIdxIn;
2444  uint16_t detObjIdxProc;
2445  uint8_t pingPongIdx;
2446  uint32_t trueNumObjsIn;
2447 
2448  float range;
2449  uint32_t numObjsOut = 0;
2450  uint16_t numParams;
2451  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
2452 
2453  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj;
2454  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
2455  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
2456 
2457  if (handle == NULL)
2458  {
2459  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2460  goto exit;
2461  }
2462  aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
2463  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2464  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
2465  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
2466 
2467  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2468 
2469  if (numObjsIn == 0U)
2470  {
2471  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsIn;
2472  outParams->stats.waitTime = 0;
2473  outParams->stats.processingTime = 0;
2474  retVal = 0;
2475  goto exit;
2476  }
2477 
2478  /**********************************************/
2479  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
2480  /**********************************************/
2481  retVal = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle,
2482  AOAProcHWADoneIsrCallback,
2483  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2484  if (retVal != 0)
2485  {
2486  goto exit;
2487  }
2488 
2489  /* Azimuth heap doppler compensation */
2490  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2491  {
2492  /* Perform 2D FFT for all range bins and save zero Doppler bin */
2493  retVal = AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(aoaHwaObj,
2494  &waitTimeLocal);
2495  if (retVal != 0)
2496  {
2497  goto exit;
2498  }
2499  }
2500 
2501  /* Angle estimation */
2502  if(DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim == 1)
2503  {
2504  /*If there is only one virtual antenna, there is no
2505  need of azimuth FFT as azimuth can not be estimated.*/
2506 
2507  /* Limit number of input samples */
2508  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
2509  {
2510  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
2511  }
2512 
2513  /* Fill the output list */
2514  for(idx=0; idx < numObjsIn; idx++)
2515  {
2516  range = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].rangeIdx * DPParams->rangeStep;
2517  res->detObjOut[idx].y = range;
2518  res->detObjOut[idx].x = 0.;
2519  res->detObjOut[idx].z = 0.;
2520 
2521  res->detObjOut[idx].velocity = DPParams->dopplerStep *
2522  AOA_DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].dopplerIdx,
2523  DPParams->numDopplerBins);
2524  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].snr = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].snr;
2525  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].noise = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].noise;
2526  }
2527  numObjsOut = numObjsIn;
2528  }
2529  else
2530  {
2531  /* Limit number of input samples */
2532  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
2533  {
2534  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
2535  }
2536  trueNumObjsIn = numObjsIn;
2537  /* Make number of detected objects EVEN */
2538  if (numObjsIn & 0x1)
2539  {
2540  /* If odd number of input objects, add dummy as duplicated last object */
2541  res->cfarRngDopSnrList[numObjsIn] = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[numObjsIn-1];
2542  numObjsIn++;
2543  }
2544 
2545 
2546  /* Configure HWA Params*/
2547  retVal = HWAutil_configHWA_extendedVelocityScheme(hwaHandle,
2548  res,
2549  DPParams,
2550  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr,
2551  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg.enabled,
2552  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS);
2553  if (retVal != 0)
2554  {
2555  goto exit;
2556  }
2557 
2558  /* Configure Common HWA registers */
2559  numParams = 2*(DPParams->numTxAntennas + 2 + ((DPParams->numVirtualAntElev > 0) & 0x1));
2560  retVal = AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (hwaHandle,
2561  numObjsIn/2, //numLoops,
2562  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
2563  numParams);
2564  if (retVal != 0)
2565  {
2566  goto exit;
2567  }
2568 
2569 
2570  /* Configure EDMA */
2571  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_EDMA(hwaHandle,
2572  res,
2573  DPParams,
2574  0,//srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr
2575  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
2576  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
2577  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
2578  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
2579  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
2580  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
2581  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
2582  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg.enabled);
2583  if (retVal != 0)
2584  {
2585  goto exit;
2586  }
2587 
2588  /* Enable the HWA */
2589  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
2590  if (retVal != 0)
2591  {
2592  goto exit;
2593  }
2594 
2595  /* Trigger first two objects */
2596  detObjIdxIn = 0;
2597  pingPongIdx = 0;
2598  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
2599  detObjIdxIn,
2600  pingPongIdx);
2601  detObjIdxIn = 1;
2602  pingPongIdx = 1;
2603  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
2604  detObjIdxIn,
2605  pingPongIdx);
2606  /* Loop through the list two objects per loop */
2607  detObjIdxIn = 2;
2608  detObjIdxProc = 0;
2609  while(detObjIdxProc < numObjsIn)
2610  {
2611  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
2612  {
2613  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
2614  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2615  retVal = AOAHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
2616  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2617  if (retVal != 0)
2618  {
2619  goto exit;
2620  }
2621  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2622  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
2623  1,
2624  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev,
2625  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx],
2626  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx]);
2627  /* Doppler Compensation - */
2628  aoaHwa_dopplerCompensation((uint32_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx],
2629  &res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdxProc + pingPongIdx],
2630  (uint32_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalHypothesesBuf[pingPongIdx],
2631  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
2632  DPParams->numRxAntennas,
2633  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim,
2634  DPParams->numVirtualAntElev,
2635  DPParams->numDopplerBins,
2636  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg.enabled);
2637  /* Trigger 3D-FFT */
2638  AoAProcHWA_trigger_EDMA_3DFFT(aoaHwaObj, pingPongIdx);
2639  }
2640 
2641  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
2642  {
2643  /* Wait until EDMA outputs 3D-FFTs and Maximum peaks */
2644  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2645  retVal = AOAHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
2646  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2647  if (retVal != 0)
2648  {
2649  goto exit;
2650  }
2651  if (detObjIdxProc < trueNumObjsIn)
2652  {
2653  numObjsOut = AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev(aoaHwaObj,
2654  detObjIdxProc,
2655  pingPongIdx,
2656  numObjsOut);
2657  }
2658  if (detObjIdxIn < numObjsIn)
2659  {
2660  /* Trigger 2D-FFT - next target */
2661  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
2662  detObjIdxIn,
2663  pingPongIdx);
2664  }
2665  detObjIdxProc++;
2666  detObjIdxIn++;
2667  }
2668 
2669  } /* Loop per two detected points */
2670 
2671 
2672 
2673  /* Disable the HWA */
2674  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
2675  if (retVal != 0)
2676  {
2677  goto exit;
2678  }
2679 
2680  }
2681 
2682  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsOut;
2683  outParams->stats.waitTime = waitTimeLocal;
2684  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime - waitTimeLocal;
2685 #ifdef PROFILE_AOA_HWA_OBJ_DPU
2686  gAoAProcStats[gAoAProcStatsIdx] = *outParams;
2687  gAoAProcStatsIdx = (gAoAProcStatsIdx +1) & 0xf;
2688 #endif
2689 
2690  /* Process is done, disable Done interrupt */
2691  HWA_disableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle);
2692 exit:
2693  return retVal;
2694 }
2695 
2696 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_control
2697 (
2698  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
2699  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd cmd,
2700  void *arg,
2701  uint32_t argSize
2702 )
2703 {
2704  int32_t retVal = 0;
2705  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
2706 
2707  /* Get rangeProc data object */
2708  if (aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2709  {
2710  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2711  goto exit;
2712  }
2713 
2714  switch(cmd)
2715  {
2716  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_FovAoACfg:
2717  {
2718  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg)) ||
2719  (arg == NULL))
2720  {
2721  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2722  goto exit;
2723  }
2724  else
2725  {
2726  /* Save configuration */
2727  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, (DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *) arg);
2728 
2729  }
2730  }
2731  break;
2732  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg:
2733  {
2734  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg)) ||
2735  (arg == NULL))
2736  {
2737  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2738  goto exit;
2739  }
2740  else
2741  {
2742  /* Save configuration */
2743  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg, arg, argSize);
2744  }
2745  }
2746  break;
2747  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_ExtMaxVelocityCfg:
2748  {
2749  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_ExtendedMaxVelocityCfg)) ||
2750  (arg == NULL))
2751  {
2752  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2753  goto exit;
2754  }
2755  else
2756  {
2757  /* Save configuration */
2758  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg, arg, argSize);
2759  }
2760  }
2761  break;
2762  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_CompRxChannelBiasCfg:
2763  {
2764  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_compRxChannelBiasCfg)) ||
2765  (arg == NULL))
2766  {
2767  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2768  goto exit;
2769  }
2770  else
2771  {
2772  /* Save configuration */
2773  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg, arg, argSize);
2774  }
2775  }
2776  break;
2777  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap:
2778  {
2779  if((argSize != sizeof(bool)) ||
2780  (arg == NULL))
2781  {
2782  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2783  goto exit;
2784  }
2785  else
2786  {
2787  /* Sanity check on saved heapmap ptr and size */
2788  if ((aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
2789  (aoaHwaObj->params.numRangeBins * aoaHwaObj->params.numVirtualAntAzim)) ||
2790  (aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL))
2791  {
2792  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2793  goto exit;
2794  }
2795 
2796  /* Save configuration */
2797  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap, arg, argSize);
2798  }
2799  }
2800  break;
2801  default:
2802  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2803  break;
2804  }
2805 exit:
2806  return (retVal);
2807 }
2808 
2809 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_deinit(DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle)
2810 {
2811  int32_t retVal = 0;
2812 
2813  if (handle == NULL)
2814  {
2815  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2816  goto exit;
2817  }
2818  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
2819 exit:
2820  return (retVal);
2821 }
